## Explore Model Results Interactively

```{r}
#| output: false

trans <- as.data.frame(readRDS("last_results/trans.rds"))

ojs_define(trans = trans)
```

```{ojs}
yearlyChart = Plot.plot({
  marks: [
    Plot.line(transpose(trans), 
      {x: "time", y: "time"}, 
      { stroke: "black" }
    )
  ]}
)
```
